sentences.en: Eleven o'clock came, and the tavern lights were put out; darkness everywhere, now.
sentences.cn: 11点钟, 客栈也熄了灯, 现在到处一片漆黑.

sentences.en: First he stopped at a tavern for a biteand a sup.
sentences.cn: 他首先找了个酒馆歇歇脚、吃点什么.

sentences.en: First talk to the Silent guy in the tavern.
sentences.cn: 最初和酒馆里的沉默人谈话.

sentences.en: From where he sat he made an imperceptible sign to the tavern - keeper.
sentences.cn: 这时他从他座上向那酒店老板使了个眼色.

sentences.en: He stayed pretty long in the tavern.
I was standing near a tavern door.
sentences.cn: 我正站在一家酒店门口.

sentences.en: Philip always went to the tavern, with a sense of pleasure.
sentences.cn: 菲利浦总是心情愉快地来到这家酒菜馆.

sentences.en: Players should no longer experience ethereality issues after a tavern brawl.
sentences.cn: 酒馆乱斗将不会某名奇妙损失玩家的经验.

sentences.en: So I went to see him after I left the tavern.
sentences.cn: 所以离开酒馆,我就去拜访他.

sentences.en: Tavern mercenaries refresh every 48 hours instead of 72 hours.
sentences.cn: 酒馆的雇佣兵每48小时刷新一次,替代以前的72小时.

sentences.en: Tavern: Pirates on the rise like the rum and beer served here.
sentences.cn: 小型酒馆: 高等级的海盗们喜欢的朗姆酒和啤酒在这里供应.

sentences.en: The sailor narrated the story of his life to me in the tavern.
sentences.cn: 那水手在这酒店里向我讲述了他的一生.

sentences.en: There is a tavern at the corner of the street.
sentences.cn: 街道的拐角处有一家酒馆.

sentences.en: What would you be LEAST likely to order at a tavern?
sentences.cn: 在客栈你最不喜欢要的是什么?

sentences.en: When he went into town, to be sure, there was high talk at the tavern.
sentences.cn: 他进城去的时候, 当然听到酒店里的人们的高谈阔论.

trans.tran_en: a  pub  where you can also stay the night
